OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CITIZENS ADVICE BUREAU DEBT SUPPORT UNIT (DSU)

Desc.entry: Provides training and consultancy service for Sheffield advice centres and other agencies in matters relating to credit and debt. Advises people who are currently serving in the Armed Forces or UK Veterans. Provides debt and benefits advice to tenants of housing associations and Sheffield Homes. Referral has to be made by the housing provider. All the major housing associations with properties in Sheffield (except Places for People) and Sheffield Homes are part of the Project and may make referrals. Publications include: Dealing with your Debts, self-help information booklet; Annual Report; Good Practice Guidelines for Debt Advisors; Practical Ideas for Improving Advice Services for Disabled People in Debt; Debt and Disabilities (research findings from qualitative research into experience of disabled people with debt); Poverty, Debt and Indifference (a study of household debts and advice needs in the Pakistani community in Sheffield). The Debt Support Unit and ACSIS (Advice Centre Support in Sheffield) have merged and provide a fifteen-week programme - the Basic Advice Work Skills Course and specialist short courses for advisers. Company limited by guarantee no 4638224.
